titles.title: A resolution disapproving the request of the President for extension under section 2103(c)(1)(B)(i) of the Bipartisan Trade Promotion Authority Act of 2002, of the trade promotion authorities under that Act.

A resolution disapproving the request of the President for extension under section 2103(c)(1)(B)(i) of the Bipartisan Trade Promotion Authority Act of 2002, of the trade promotion authorities under that Act.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Declares that the Senate disapproves the President's request for the extension of the trade authorities procedures under the Bipartisan Trade Promotion Authority Act of 2002 to any implementing bill concerning a trade agreement entered into under such Act after June 30, 2005.
